headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing Ball’s Story And Edge Against Competitors
summary: The latest update to Ball’s story centers on a slightly higher fair value estimate, now about US$62.69 per share versus roughly US$60.15, shaped by nuanced shifts in the model’s building blocks. A slightly lower discount rate of about 7.50% and a more cautious revenue growth assumption of about 4.24% together reflect how recent Street research is balancing improved execution and volume expectations with lingering questions around 2026 demand.
